MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 13-NOV-2020 18:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the LL19 postcode area of Prestatyn, affecting properties in Pendre Avenue and surrounding area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault on our underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:05pm on the 13th November 2020.
